## Sort.isSorted() method

Returns true if the array is already sorted.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
static isSorted<T>(array: T[], comparer?: (x: any, y: any) => number): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  array | <code>T[]</code> |  |
|  comparer | <code>(x: any, y: any) =&gt; number</code> |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

`boolean`
